item.title: Ozempic, Wegovy among 15 drugs selected for next round of Medicare price negotiations
item.description: The price negotiations almost assures billions of dollars in savings for taxpayers.

item.title: Elon Musk’s gaming scandal deepens as X owner attempts to silence streamer Asmongold for blowing the whistle
item.description: Elon Musk boasted he's among the world's top ranked video game players. Now he's getting called out by other gamers for supposedly lying about his rec...

item.title: The people who ghost you may think they’re being nice—and be more willing to help than you assume
item.description: Ghosters are more likely to offer help than ghostees expect, a study shows—with implications for careers and networking.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds law banning TikTok if it’s not sold by its Chinese parent company
item.description: Ruling: The risk to national security posed by its ties to China overcomes concerns about limiting speech by the app or its 170 million users in the U...

item.title: Mastercard slapped with $26 million discrimination lawsuit after being accused of underpaying thousands of employees
item.description: The company was accused of underpaying 7,500 female, Black, and Hispanic US employees compared to their male and white colleagues.
